entities.name: flame
entities.description: The flame danced into life, its reflection wavered on their dusty glass and silver.

entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: Bathilda fumbled with logs for the fire, he muttered 'Tergeo'; the dust vanished from the photographs...

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: ...the young man who had perched on Gregorovitch's windowsill, smiling lazily up at Harry out of the silver frame.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: ...smiling lazily up at Harry out of the silver frame. And it came to Harry instantly where he had seen the boy before...

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: ...in The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore, arm in arm with teenage Dumbledore...

entities.name: rita's book
entities.description: ...that must be where all the missing photographs were in Rita's book.

relationships.description: ...the young man who had perched on Gregorovitch's windowsill, smiling lazily up at Harry out of the silver frame.
...smiling lazily up at Harry out of the silver frame. And it came to Harry instantly where he had seen the boy before: in The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore, arm in arm with teenage Dumbledore...
...that must be where all the missing photographs were in Rita's book.
